com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.text_to_speech.v1

Class TextToSpeech

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.service.WatsonService
      • com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.text_to_speech.v1.TextToSpeech

  • public class TextToSpeech
extends WatsonService
    The Text to Speech service uses IBM's speech synthesis capabilities to convert text to an audio signal. The audio is streamed back to the client in a InputStream
    See Also:
    Text to Speech

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.service.WatsonService

                          java.lang.String customizationId)

        customizationId - the customization id
        Returns:

      • getPronunciation

        public ServiceCall<Pronunciation> getPronunciation(java.lang.String word,
                                          Voice voice,
                                          Phoneme phoneme)
        Returns the phonetic pronunciation for the word specified.
        Parameters:
        word - The word for which the pronunciation is requested.
        voice - the voice to obtain the pronunciation for the specified word in the language of that voice.
        phoneme - the phoneme set in which to return the pronunciation
        Returns:
        the word pronunciation
        See Also:
        Pronunciation

      • getPronunciation

                                          Voice voice,
                                          Phoneme phoneme,

        Parameters:
        word - The word for which the pronunciation is requested.
        voice - the voice to obtain the pronunciation for the specified word in the language of that voice.
        phoneme - the phoneme set in which to return the pronunciation
        customizationId - the customization id
        Returns:
        the word pronunciation

      • createCustomVoiceModel

        public ServiceCall<CustomVoiceModel> createCustomVoiceModel(java.lang.String name,
                                                   java.lang.String language,
                                                   java.lang.String description)
        Creates a new CustomVoiceModel with the specified name, description, and language.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the new model
        language - the language of the new model (the default is "en-US")
        description - a description of the new model (the default is no description)
        Returns:
        a CustomVoiceModel that contains the id of the new model

      • updateCustomVoiceModel

        public ServiceCall<java.lang.Void> updateCustomVoiceModel(CustomVoiceModel model)
        Updates an existing CustomVoiceModel with new name, new description, and new custom word translations. If no translation with a given word exists, a new translation is created. Otherwise, the existing translation is updated.
        Parameters:
        model - the custom voice model object to be updated with new name, description, and words
        Returns:
        the service call

      • deleteCustomVoiceModel

        public ServiceCall<java.lang.Void> deleteCustomVoiceModel(CustomVoiceModel model)
        Deletes the given CustomVoiceModel.
        Parameters:
        model - the custom voice model object to be deleted
        Returns:
        the service call

      • getWords

        public ServiceCall<java.util.List<CustomTranslation>> getWords(CustomVoiceModel model)
        Gets all custom word translation for the given CustomVoiceModel.
        Parameters:
        model - the custom voice model object from which words are to be listed
        Returns:
        a list of all CustomTranslations for the model

      • getWord

        public ServiceCall<CustomTranslation> getWord(CustomVoiceModel model,
                                     java.lang.String word)
        Gets a custom word translation for the given CustomVoiceModel.
        Parameters:
        model - the custom voice model object from which a word is to be listed
        word - a word from the CustomVoiceModel
        Returns:
        the translation of the word

      • addWords

        public ServiceCall<java.lang.Void> addWords(CustomVoiceModel model,
                                   CustomTranslation... translations)
        Adds or updates one or more custom word translations for a CustomVoiceModel. If no translation with a given word exists, a new translation is created. Otherwise, the existing translation is updated.
        Parameters:
        model - the custom voice model object for which words are to be added or updated
        translations - the custom translations to be added or updated
        Returns:
        the service call

      • addWord

        public ServiceCall<java.lang.Void> addWord(CustomVoiceModel model,
                                  CustomTranslation translation)
        Adds or updates a single custom word translation for a CustomVoiceModel. If no translation with the given word exists, a new translation is created. Otherwise, the existing translation is updated.
        Parameters:
        model - the custom voice model object for which a word is to be added or updated
        translation - the translation to be added or updated
        Returns:
        the service call

      • deleteWord

        public ServiceCall<java.lang.Void> deleteWord(CustomVoiceModel model,
                                     CustomTranslation translation)
        Deletes a custom word based on a translation object.
        Parameters:
        model - the custom voice model object from which a word is to be deleted
        translation - the translation object to be deleted
        Returns:
        the service call

        Deletes a custom word based on a string.
